archimate:Requirement.name: TS.1.3.7a: a) be active at all times (e.g. by scanning files as they are accessed to provide real-time protection or configured to be active at all times and restart if stopped)
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
